data.name: ApostlesCreedPrayDescription
data.value: I believe in God, the Father Almighty, Creator of heaven and earth; and in Jesus Christ, His only Son, our Lord; Who was conceived by the Holy Spirit, born of the Virgin Mary, suffered under Pontius Pilate, was crucified, died, and was buried. He descended into hell; the third day He arose again from the dead. He ascended into heaven, and sits at the right hand of God, the Father Almighty; from thence He shall come to judge the living and the dead. I believe in the Holy Spirit, the Holy Catholic Church, the communion of Saints, the forgiveness of sins, the resurrection of the body and life everlasting. Amen.

data.name: ApostlesCreedPrayName
data.value: Apostles Creed

data.name: DivineMercyPrayDescription
data.value: For the sake of His sorrowful Passion, have mercy on us and on the whole world.

data.name: DivineMercyPrayName
data.value: Divine Mercy

data.name: EternalFatherPrayDescription
data.value: Eternal Father, I offer you the Body and Blood, Soul and Divinity of Your Dearly Beloved Son, Our Lord, Jesus Christ, in atonement for our sins and those of the whole world.

data.name: EternalFatherPrayName
data.value: Eternal Father

data.name: FatimaPrayerPrayDescription
data.value: My God, I believe, I adore, I hope, and I love You. I beg pardon of You for those who do not believe, do not adore, do not hope, and do not love You.\nMary, Queen of the Holy Rosary, pray for us. Mary, Queen of Peace, pray for us. Mary, Our Loving Mother, pray for us.

data.name: FatimaPrayerPrayName
data.value: Fatima Prayer

data.name: GloryBePrayDescription
data.value: Glory be to the Father, and to the Son, and to the Holy Spirit. As it was in the beginning, is now, and ever shall be, world without end. Amen.

data.name: GloryBePrayName
data.value: Glory Be

data.name: GratitudePrayDescription
data.value: Infinite thanks we give, Sovereign Queen, the benefits they receive every day of your liberal hands. Deign now and forever take us under your powerful protection and more you force greet you with a Salve Regina.

data.name: GratitudePrayName
data.value: Gratitude

data.name: HailHolyQueenPrayDescription
data.value: Hail, holy Queen, Mother of Mercy, Our life, our sweetness and our hope. To thee do we cry, poor banished children of Eve, To thee do we send up our sighs, Mourning and weeping in this valley of tears. Turn then, most gracious Advocate, thine eyes of mercy toward us, And after this our exile, show unto us the blessed fruit of thy womb, Jesus. O clement, O loving, O sweet Virgin Mary! Pray for us, O Holy Mother of God, That we may be made worthy of the promises of Christ. Amen.

data.name: HailHolyQueenPrayName
data.value: Hail Holy Queen

data.name: HailMaryPrayDescription
data.value: Hail Mary, full of grace, the Lord is with thee; blessed are thou among women, and blessed is the fruit of thy womb, Jesus. Holy Mary, Mother of God, pray for us sinners, now and at the hour of our death. Amen.

data.name: HailMaryPrayName
data.value: Hail Mary

data.name: HolyGodPrayDescription
data.value: Holy God, Holy Mighty One, Holy Immortal One, have mercy on us and on the whole world.

data.name: HolyGodPrayName
data.value: Holy God

data.name: OurFatherPrayDescription
data.value: Our Father, Who art in heaven, Hallowed be Thy Name; Thy kingdom come, Thy will be done, on earth as it is in heaven. Give us this day our daily bread, and forgive us our trespasses, as we forgive those who trespass against us; and lead us not into temptation, but deliver us from evil. Amen.

data.name: OurFatherPrayName
data.value: Our Father

data.name: ShortPrayerPrayDescription
data.value: O my Jesus, have mercy on us. Forgive us our sins. Save us from the fires of hell. Take all souls into heaven, especially, those most in need of thy mercy. Amen.

data.name: ShortPrayerPrayName
data.value: Short Prayer

data.name: SignOfTheCrossPrayDescription
data.value: In the name of Father, and of the Son, and of the Holy Spirit. Amen.

data.name: SignOfTheCrossPrayName
data.value: Sign Of The Cross
